name: Plain Balaclava
description:
This stylish Balaclava is crafted from a soft fuzzy knit for a cozy feel. Designed with a unisex fit, it provides both warmth and a sleek, cool look.
Made from a durable blend of 60% polyamide and 40% acrylic.
Made in Germany. Hand wash only. If it starts to look fuzzy, use a soft bristle brush to gently smooth the surface, and it will look like new again.

Ships within 1-2 weeks.

name: Skimask Balaclava
description:
This stylish Skimask Balaclava is crafted from a soft fuzzy knit for a cozy feel. Designed with versatility in mind, you can wear it in different ways: pull it over your nose for maximum coverage or leave your face out for a more casual look. Its unisex fit ensures comfort and warmth while adding a pop of color with its vibrant pink shade.

Material:

Made from a durable blend of 60% polyamide and 40% acrylic.

Care Instructions:

Made in Germany. Hand wash only. If it starts to look fuzzy, use a soft bristle brush to gently smooth the surface, and it will look like new again.



Ships within 1-2 weeks.

name: Black Balaclava with Pink Bows
description:
This unique Balaclava combines a soft, fuzzy knit with delicate pink bows for an elegant yet playful look. Perfect for adding a bold statement to your outfit while keeping warm and cozy. Its unisex design ensures a comfortable Made from a durable blend of 60% polyamide and 40% acrylic.
Made in Germany. Hand wash only. If it starts to look fuzzy, use a soft bristle brush to gently smooth the surface, and it will look like new again.

Ships within 1-2 weeks.

name: Pierced Black Balaclava
description:
This stylish Balaclava is crafted from a soft fuzzy knit for a cozy feel. Designed with edgy piercings for a bold, statement look. Designed with a unisex fit, it provides both warmth and a sleek, cool look.
Made from a durable blend of 60% polyamide and 40% acrylic.
Made in Germany. Hand wash only. If it starts to look fuzzy, use a soft bristle brush (such as an edge brush) to gently smooth the surface, and it will look like new again.

Ships within 1-2 weeks.

name: Bagzilla – Pink
description:
The Bagzilla in pink is a bold and stylish large bag designed to make a statement. Crafted from recycled T-shirt yarn, it combines sustainability with a unique texture and durability. Its vibrant pink color adds a pop of personality, making it the perfect bag for everyday use. Available in other colors upon request – contact us on Instagram or via email!

name: The Rough Cut Bag – Orange
description:
A bold and unique statement piece, the Rough Cut Bag is designed with raw, visible stitching and a deconstructed finish. Made from orange faux leather with a textured surface, this bag showcases its handmade craftsmanship with exposed threads and crisscross stitching, offering an edgy, artistic vibe.
Measurements:
• Width: 60 cm
• Height: 60 cm
Perfect for those who appreciate a unique, bold look that embraces imperfection. For custom colors, please contact us via Instagram or email!

name: The Rough Cut Bag – Dark Grey
description:

Perfect for layering and brightening up any cold-weather outfit.
